Description.Text: Other amenities/ services: Rooms with Line phone with direct local and international connections. Elegant lobby, Breakfast/dining room, Dry-cleaning and laundry services, Foreign exchange facilities, Security service 24-hour a day.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Close to main government buildings, the Congress Center and the offices of the World Bank and other international Organizations, close to the Center, Tirana Park - 80m. Nearest Airport: Tirana's international airport , Rinas - 22miles.
